name: Kittycare Demo
description: Hi I'm De_novakin! This is the demo of my current project, a dating sim, named "Kittycare"! The sim will take place in a pet daycare! With many datable characters! and a few secret routes! Though none of that has been coded yet! In this demo, You will be introduced to 3 of my characters,  2 of them will be later datables and the other is a companion character! It is a shirt but a sweet demo!! more is coming soon!
